 1998-20461998-11-190,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  FIN,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS by adding ten new companies to the list of companies in section 8604 that are to be treated as financial institutions for the purposes of the Tax on Large Corporations, by eliminating any inappropriate retroactive application of that tax on companies who are already listed, and by correcting a cross-referencing error in section 8605.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1998-0571 Publication Date: 1998-12-09
